title: 1 Bedroom 1 Bath 5 Miles Northwest of DTLA | Quality Living!
posting_body: ['Welcome to Silver Lake Towers Apartments in Los Angeles, where all the comforts of modern living become infused with a historic California touch.', 'You can find us five miles northwest of downtown Los Angeles.', 'The prominent neighborhood of Sunset Junction is conveniently located nearby, offering an eclectic taste of Los Angeles diversity.', 'With easy access to the Hollywood Freeway, you can quickly be on your way to the office or off for a magical day in Hollywood.', "However, you'll find almost everything you need within walking distance; anything from shops to various restaurants for various cultural cuisine.", 'The nearby Silver Lake Reservoir offers trails for walking and hiking, perfect for grabbing some sun.', 'Our pet-friendly apartments in Los Angeles, CA, provide a dog run to help give your four-legged friend a chance to stretch their legs outside.', "So, whether you're new to the city, an LA resident looking for something more central, or relocating for work or school, everyone is welcome in our community.", 'Community Amenities:', '- Community Vending Machines', '- Dog Run', '- Controlled Access', '- Elevator Service', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Request & Response', '- Located', 'In The Heart of Sunset Junction', '- Extraordinary Customer Service', '- Resident Portal With Easy Online Payments', '- On-Site Clothes Care Facility', 'Apartment Amenities:', '- Nine Foot Ceilings', '- Exposed Brick', '- Spacious Closets', '- Detailed Upgrades', '- Additional Storage Space Available', '- 3-In-1 Gas Ranges', '- Disposal', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Refrigerator', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats and Dogs Welcome.', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed, Rent $45, Deposit $400.', 'Breed restrictions may apply.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', 'Square Footage Is Approximate.', 'Price and availability are subject to change.', '3408 Sunset Boulevard Los Angeles, CA', 'show contact info']
